mapper.select: select postNo, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCount, sameThinking, uploadFileName, boardNo, (select count(*) from reply where postNo = f.postNo) as replyCount from freeBoard f where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by postNo DESC
select count(*) from freeBoard where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into freeBoard(boardNo, title, content, writer, regDate, uploadFileName) values(#{boardNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, Now(), #{uploadFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update freeBoard set sameThinking = sameThinking + 1 where postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.select: select boardName from boardInCategory where boardNo=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update freeBoard set viewCount = viewCount + 1 where postNo = #{postNo}
